faq

answers to your burning questions

{% endblock %} {% block page_content %}

  • how is your soap different than commercial “soap”?
  • Where and how is it made?
  • What is the size of your soap?
  • How long will your soap last?

  • Whats in the soap?
  • how is your soap different than commercial “soap”?
  • Where and how is it made?
  • What is the size of your soap?
  • How long will your soap last?

  • Do you test your products on animals?

Whats in the soap?

Our natural soap bars are made primarily from the following five natural oils which are the base for all of our soaps:

Olive Oil
Coconut Oil
Soybean Oil
Hemp Oil
Shea Butter

We find that these oils represent the best combination of nutrients and vitamins to keep your skin healthy and soft. None of our soaps contain Palm Oil which is typically farmed through tropical rainforest deforestation and whose source is hard to verify.

Cold process soaps contain lye which is naturally removed during the soap making process. Our soaps also contain essential oils or fragrance oils that are gentle on your skin, as well as natural exfoliants such as oatmeal, leaves, and sand.

how is your soap different than commercial “soap”?

Our natural soap bars are made primarily from the following five natural oils which are the base for all of our soaps:

Olive Oil
Coconut Oil
Soybean Oil
Hemp Oil
Shea Butter

We find that these oils represent the best combination of nutrients and vitamins to keep your skin healthy and soft. None of our soaps contain Palm Oil which is typically farmed through tropical rainforest deforestation and whose source is hard to verify.

Cold process soaps contain lye which is naturally removed during the soap making process. Our soaps also contain essential oils or fragrance oils that are gentle on your skin, as well as natural exfoliants such as oatmeal, leaves, and sand.

Add to cart

Tough just like you, this black soap has a natural pine tar oil blend. The true pine oil brings the woods to your shower,like bathing in a massive old growth pine forest! The soap has a massaging, exfoliating effect because of the oatmeal and sand; if you’re manly you’ll love this bar.

pick the bars that fit your guy

make it special with extras and a note

Between boxing, jui-jitsu , running, and lifting weights I shower alot. This soap is fantastic and doesn't damage my skin like chemical based soaps do, buy it -- Scott L.

Awesome Man Soap, Pine Tar Rocks!

The soap works wonders. I can punch steaks out of cows, drink lots of beer with no hangovers, and lift buildings. -- Chris T.

Men’s Shampoo & Conditioner

Daily hair care to compliment your bar

We’re currently forumulating this puppy. It will be nutrient dense for scalp and hair health, and without common chemcicals added to shampoos. We’re thinking a nice woodsy scent that is similiar to our pine tar. Target Date June 2015.

The Ultimate Shave Bar

Respect your mug with a skin friendly shave

You already love the skin benefits of the Squatch bar, so we’re kicking it up a notch with the perfect shave bar. We’ll be adding stuff like bentonite clay and helichrysum to provide the perfect way to get a close shave and protect your face. Target date May 2015.
